Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.Searcher.addFacet(String, boolean, List<String>)
    this will be removed in v2.0, use Searcher.addFacetRefinement(String, List, boolean) instead.
    com.algolia.instantsearch.utils.ItemClickSupport.addTo(RecyclerView)
    com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding.BindingHelper.bindAttribute(View, String, Boolean, Integer, String, String, String)
    This should only be used internally by InstantSearch.
    com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding.BindingHelper.bindAttribute(View, String, String)
    This should only be used internally by InstantSearch.
